Name: distal arthrogryposis
Definition: A muscle tissue disease characterized by congenital joint contractures of hand and feet.

Name: rippling muscle disease 2
Definition: A muscle tissue disease characterized by mechanically triggered contractions of skeletal muscle and that has_material_basis_in mutation in the caveolin-3 gene (CAV3) on chromosome 3p25.
Synonym: autosomal dominant limb-girdle muscular dystrophy type 1C

Name: rippling muscle disease 1
Definition: A muscle tissue disease characterized by electrically silent contractions of the skeletal muscles in response to mechanical stimuli. It has_material_basis in mutation in the gene localized to 1q41 at the distal end of the long arm of chromosome 1

Name: myostatin-related muscle hypertrophy
Definition: A muscle tissue disease characterized by increased muscle bulk and strength that has material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the MSTN gene on chromosome 2q32.2.

Name: myotonia congenita
Definition: A muscle tissue disease that is characterised by slow muscle relaxation associated with hyperexcitation of the muscle fibres.

Name: obsolete transplant-related disease
Definition: An immune system disease that is related to the transplantation of cells

Name: obsolete Ankle or tarsus enthesopathy
Definition: An immune system disease that is related to the transplantation of cells

Name: myopathy
Definition: A muscular disease in which the muscle fibers do not function resulting in muscular weakness.

Name: malignant hyperthermia
Definition: A muscle tissue disease that is characterized by a drastic and uncontrolled increase in skeletal muscle oxidative metabolism
